VSLAM-LAB/VSLAM-LAB

visual slam experiments toolkit with easy dataset handling and benchmarking

View on index

Related repos

  • dense SLAM with neural implicit encoding for indoor scenes
  • Visual SLAM using a 3D prior for dynamic environments
  • monocular SLAM for huge outdoor scenes using hierarchical Gaussian splats
  • Data visualization and analysis software with interactive notebooks
  • C++ library for robotics and vision smoothing, mapping, and sensor fusion
  • Toolkit for data visualization apps
  • Shows how to use OpenCV and COLMAP for simple structure from motion and 3D scene reconstruction
  • Tracks 3D points across multiple camera views
  • Real-time dense SLAM from a single camera using 3D reconstruction priors, with global pose and geometry estimation at 15 FPS
  • open source builds of VS Code without telemetry
